alert.note: Alert for Bear Lake and Bear River Valley; Wasatch Mountains I-80 North (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 01 at 6:06PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Cache and northern Rich Counties through 645 PM MDT... At 606 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles southwest of Laketown, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Randolph, Laketown, Garden City, Garden, Bear Lake, Meadowville and Pickelville. This includes the following highways... US Route 89 mile marker 497 and near mile marker 499. Utah Route 30 between mile markers 110 and 134. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Bear Lake and Bear River Valley; Wasatch Mountains I-80 North
